Customers will enjoy One-Day Delivery on millions of products, and can browse products with clear, local pricing and without additional customs charges. t: Amazon Ireland Gets Global Boost with Launch of Amazon.ie | Carbon6
s: December 11, 2024 - Amazon’s entry into Ireland gives local businesses access to a market projected to generate €500 million in annual revenue, a figure expected to grow at a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of 10%. This is a golden opportunity for Irish brands to expand their customer base.
